name: guitar-practice-journal
description: A comprehensive guitar practice tracking application
author: S. Urista

scripts.bump-patch: node bump-version.js patch && npm run update-version
scripts.bump-minor: node bump-version.js minor && npm run update-version
scripts.bump-major: node bump-version.js major && npm run update-version
scripts.build:dev: npm run update-version && echo 'Built for Development'
scripts.build:staging: npm run update-version && echo 'Built for Staging'
scripts.build:prod: npm run update-version && echo 'Built for Production'
scripts.deploy: npm run update-version && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only hosting --config firebase.dev.json
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only hosting --config firebase.staging.json
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
